citation: COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Emergency Cessation Day) Notice 2023 (Tas)
text:
COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Emergency Cessation Day) Notice 2023

I make the following notice under section 27(2) of the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 .

5 February 2023

Jeremy Rockliff

Premier

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Emergency Cessation Day) Notice 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Emergency cessation day
    For the purposes of the COVID-19 Disease Emergency (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 , 30 April 2023 is declared to be the emergency cessation day.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 February 2023

This notice is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
